column5: I have a presentation next week and I would like to show a youtube video, problem is that there wont by any internet connection. Is there any way to download  a video directly to my computer so I can play it directly from my comp ?  I used to have a program that did this but once I formatted my HD I'm no longer able to find it...  Thanks guys !
Just do an internet search for "Youtube downloader".
Type "how to download videos from YouTube" into your search engine and you should come up with many options.  Regards, Snowball
Hello, As everyone has pointed out You Tube Downloader here's a link for a free download  Download Youtube Downloader
